options.title: AI Bookmark Finder - Settings
options.deepseekLink: Get API Key from DeepSeek Platform
options.deepseekHint: Create a new key in the "API Keys" page after registration
options.openaiLink: Get API Key from OpenAI Platform
options.openaiHint: Valid OpenAI account and payment method required
options.compatibleHint: Contact your system administrator for API Key
options.hint:
Tip: API Key is required for DeepSeek, OpenAI, or OpenAI-Compatible.
OpenAI-Compatible is suitable for internal company services or other OpenAI-compatible APIs.
If unsure about authentication, check API documentation or contact your administrator.
options.testLocalMode: Local matching mode, no test needed
options.testNoEndpoint: Please configure custom API Endpoint first
options.languageHint: Select "Auto Detect" to automatically switch based on browser language
options.contextTitleUrl: Title + URL (More Accurate, Slightly Higher Cost)
options.contextHint:
üí° Title Only: Faster response, less token consumption, suitable for bookmarks with rich titles
Title + URL: AI can extract more details from URLs (domain, path parameters, etc.) for higher matching accuracy
